doc:
Sean Stone https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sean_Stone 0 Sean Christopher Stone (born December 29, 1984) is an American actor, film director, producer, cinematographer and screenwriter. He is the son of Elizabeth Burkit Cox and film director Oliver Stone. He converted to Islam in 2012.Currently, with Tyrel Ventura and Tabetha Wallace, he hosts the television show Watching the Hawks on RT America. Sean_Christopher_Stone ( born December_29_,_1984 ) is an_American_actor , film_director , producer_,_cinematographer_and_screenwriter . He is the_son of Elizabeth_Burkit_Cox and film_director_Oliver_Stone . He converted to Islam in 2012 . Currently , with Tyrel_Ventura and Tabetha_Wallace , he hosts the_television_show Watching the_Hawks on RT_America .
